title: IHoleTable.GetTableAnnotations
description: Gets the hole table annotations for this hole table feature.
returns: Array of IHoleTableAnnotation objects for this hole table feature
remarks:
Because many of the
ITableAnnotation
APIs apply to all parts of a table annotation that has been split, you might not want all of the table annotations when just one table annotation would be sufficient.

examples.title: Hide or Show First Column in Hole Table (VB.NET)
